description:
The Kawai Complex residents (really just Mayumi, Sayaka, and Shiro) are fooling around in the living room as usual. Amidst the chaos, Ritsu`s lips and Usa`s arm connect. Ritsu`s face is bright red as she storms out of the room. The next morning, she is still noticeably unsettled, which Usa finds very endearing.
Source: crunchyroll
